docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
docs.title: Commands

docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: About Support Docs Table of Contents About The Project Getting Started Generating a GitHub SSH key Installation Usage About the Project This is repo holds all of Specific Energy's public facing documentation. Built with: Mkdocs Getting Started To get a local copy up and running follow these simple steps. Generating a GitHub SSH key More info from GitHub Create a passphrase using the random password generator of your choice. Generate an ssh key ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -C "your_email@example.com" Start the ssh-agent in the background. eval "$(ssh-agent -s)" Add your SSH key to the ssh-agent ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_ed25519 Add the SSH key to your account on GitHub Installation Clone the repo git clone git@github.com:Specific-Energy/support-docs.git Run the init script ./init.sh Usage The main folder to edit is docs/ Each page is an .md file To add a new page: Add the page as a .md file in docs Add the page in the mkdocs.yml under nav: To add a nested page: Add the page as a .md file in docs under a folder Ex: components/containers.md Add the page in the mkdocs.yml under nav: To run the project locally: mkdocs serve To build the site: mkdocs build To deploy: mkdocs gh-deploy
docs.title: About
